project.name: C-C078B-FFMP-07-ST01-DT03-DF13-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C078B-FFMP-07-ST01-DT03-DF13-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Read a string from the input. Check first if it has any command separators and then run it though a URL decoding algorithm. Then use this string to perform an nslookup by appending it to the end of the command. This allows the user to run arbitrary commands by suplying command separators encoded in url encoding.

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
